document_name: http://www.undp.org/content/dam/undp/documents/projects/UKR/Initiation Plan_Development and Commercialization of Bioenergy Technologies in the Municipal Sector of Ukraine.pdf

outputs.output_descr: The work involved in development of the project document on development and commercialization of bioenergy technologies in the municipal sector includes collection of additional data, establishment of the Biomass Support Unit within the Ministry of Agricultural Policy, detailed institutional set-up of the project, and design and implementation of the Biomass Project Ideas Competition and the Investment Grant Mechanism.

project_descr: Development and Commercialization of Bio-energy Technologies in the Municipal Sector of Ukraine
